Author: ijuanaexpire
Text: someone on this subreddit shared a recent article which says that fitbit actually UNDERESTIMATES calorie burned, and apparently there's research to support that.  tbh i dont know what to believe anymore, but i try to trust the fitbit calorie count as much as i can, because if i don't i'm going to go make myself go even crazier from constantly worrying and overthinking about its accuracy, which ultimately makes me binge from the stress making it VERY counter-intuitive
